title: Tales of the Labyrinth Nebula
description: A sweeping space opera of first contact, impossible gateways, and mysteries buried in the Labyrinth Nebula.
summary: From a strange encounter on Earth to discoveries beyond the Earth Window, the Tales of the Labyrinth Nebula follows the Fox family and the Defense Alliance as they confront unknown forces, shifting loyalties, and secrets that reshape humanity’s place in the universe.
heroImageCaption: A single encounter set a lifetime in motion.

title: Power Seven
description: A sci-fi thriller where catastrophic events reveal a hidden truth—and the cost of learning it.
summary: Strange phenomena ignite chaos around the world, leaving evidence that doesn’t fit any known explanation. Investigator David Stone is pulled into a fight against politics, time, and a reality that refuses to stay hidden.
heroImageCaption: Modern warfare erupts across contested seas.
image1Caption: David Stone examines evidence no one can explain.
image2Caption: A catastrophic event reshapes the balance of power.
image3Caption: Critical locations linked by an invisible threat.

title: The True Story of Trafalgar
description: Historical fiction that brings the overlooked lives behind Trafalgar Square into focus.
summary: Trafalgar Square is known around the world, but its monument is only the beginning. This story follows George and Riley as their lives intersect with the currents of history across London and Garristown, Ireland—revealing the complexity of love, ambition, and ordinary lives lived alongside famous events.
